text: Sign type (room ID, tactile Braille, directional, illuminated) matches approved submittals and signage plan
Font type, size, contrast, background, and symbol content matches drawings and accessibility standards
Finish and mounting system (adhesive, mechanical, wall rail) confirmed per spec
Emergency egress, exit route, fire hose/reel signage installed as part of package
Substrates clean, dry, and free of texture that may interfere with adhesion
Mechanical mounting (if applicable) has secure backing or wall anchors
Room signage mounted on latch side of door per ADA/CSA B651 requirements
Sign height consistent — 60” to center of sign from finished floor
Directional signs aligned with corridor routes or elevators
Fire safety and evacuation maps installed in required common areas
All signage clean, level, and damage-free
Final review by architect/consultant for completeness and compliance
